typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{order-id} as string,
		{order-item-id} as string,
		{purchase-date} as string,
		{payments-date} as string,
		{buyer-email} as string,
		{buyer-name} as string,
		{payment-method-details} as string,
		{buyer-phone-number} as string,
		sku as string,
		{number-of-items} as string,
		{product-name} as string,
		{quantity-purchased} as string,
		currency as string,
		{item-price} as string,
		{item-tax} as string,
		{shipping-price} as string,
		{shipping-tax} as string,
		{ship-service-level} as string,
		{ship-service-name} as string,
		{recipient-name} as string,
		{ship-address-1} as string,
		{ship-address-2} as string,
		{ship-address-3} as string,
		{address-type} as string,
		{ship-city} as string,
		{ship-state} as string,
		{ship-postal-code} as string,
		{ship-country} as string,
		{ship-phone-number} as string,
		{item-promotion-discount} as string,
		{item-promotion-id} as string,
		{ship-promotion-discount} as string,
		{ship-promotion-id} as string,
		{delivery-start-date} as string,
		{delivery-end-date} as string,
		{delivery-time-zone} as string,
		{delivery-Instructions} as string,
		{order-channel} as string,
		{order-channel-instance} as string,
		{external-order-id} as string,
		{payment-method} as string,
		{cod-collectible-amount} as string,
		{already-paid} as string,
		{payment-method-fee} as string,
		{purchase-order-number} as string,
		{is-prime} as string,
		{is-premium-order} as string,
		{tax-collection-model} as string,
		{tax-collection-responsible-party} as string,
		{default-ship-from-address-name} as string,
		{default-ship-from-address-field-1} as string,
		{default-ship-from-address-field-2} as string,
		{default-ship-from-address-field-3} as string,
		{default-ship-from-city} as string,
		{default-ship-from-state} as string,
		{default-ship-from-country} as string,
		{default-ship-from-postal-code} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-address-name} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-address-field-1} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-address-field-2} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-address-field-3} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-city} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-state} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-country} as string,
		{actual-ship-from-postal-code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dataflow1
dataflow1 derive(channel = 'Amazon',
		{week-no} = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
